description: Complete prescription lifecycle management from creation to dispensing. Includes prescription creation, verification, approval, filling, and tracking.
Comprehensive patient record management including patient creation, search, history viewing, and demographic management.
System for managing medical communications including letters, referrals, messages, and notifications with AI-powered encoding.
Role-based AI agents for automated tasks including Pharmacist, Physician, Nurse, Billing, Compliance agents, and Encoding agents.
Workflow automation system with triggers (event, schedule, condition, webhook) and actions (notification, task, API call, AI agent, workflow).
Mobile-responsive design and real-time updates for mobile devices, enabling remote work and on-the-go access.
Dashboard statistics, report generation, and analytics for system usage, performance, and compliance reporting.
